1:
CIRCULAR 02 / 2000 
 
 
 
Sub: 
CONSTITUTION OF THE AIRPORT SECURITY COMMITTEE MEETING 
AT THE AIRPORT. 
 
 
Further to this Bureau D.O. letter of even number dated 16.05.96 on the subject cited 
above and keeping in view of the security requirement, it has been decided that the security 
officer of the concerned Airlines operators shall also attend the Airport Security Committee 
meetings at the Airport as an additional member of that airlines or may replace the SM / 
APM of this airlines in the APSC. 
  
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
(P. MOHANAN) 
OFFICER ON SPECIAL DUTY (INT) 
 
 
NO.CAS-9 (8) / 96 / DIV-I 
Dated : 11.02.2000
